A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything J.J. Abrams did to resurrect the feeling of the original trilogy with its storytelling\, well-developed characters\, emotional moments\, and smart dialogue\, is lost in this movie. Instead we have gimmicks\, misplaced attempts at humor\, and no depth of feeling in this movie. With this high of a rating from \"professional critics\"\, it makes me wonder if people have given up on the hope of replicating the original.
